attributes.action: Accept the legitimate government in the Palestinian Authority and end the financial Boycott
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regognise the legally elected government in the Palestinian Authority and as such allow all aid to be re-instated and back-dated despite what any other country may wish.  This will end an enforced humanitarian crisis.  We urge you to set an example

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
